Detailed Description

2d tile map class.

This class used to store 2d indexed tile map.

Return tile index in palette for specified column and row.

Parameters:
X specified tile column.
Y specified tile row.
Returns:
Return tile index in palette or -1 or any negative value empty tile.

Int &  sX,
Int &  sY,
Int &  eX,
Int &  eY
) 
 

Get tiles columns and rows by specified border rectangle.

Parameters:
border specified border rectangle.
sX store tile upper-left corner column for specified border rectangle.
sY store tile upper-left corner row for specified border rectangle.
eX store tile lower-right corner column for specified border rectangle.
eY store tile lower-right corner row for specified border rectangle.

Get tile column and row by specified x and y coordinates.

Parameters:
xp define x value of specified coordinates.
yp define y value of specified coordinates.
X store tile column for specified coordinates.
Y store tile row for specified coordinates.

Short  yp,
Int &  X,
Int &  Y

Get tile column and row by specified x and y coordinates without clipping.

Can provide with negative values for column and row.

Parameters:
xp define x value of specified coordinates.
yp define y value of specified coordinates.
X store tile column for specified coordinates.
Y store tile row for specified coordinates.

void GetStart (  Short *  x,
Short *  y
) 
 

Get tile map position on global screen map.

Default value is (0,0).

Parameters:
x_ pointer to store tile map x upper-left corner position on global screen map.
y_ pointer to store tile map y upper-left corner position on global screen map.

Int  Y
) 
 

Return pointer to SpriteTransform class object from palette for specified column and row.

Returns:
Return pointer to SpriteTransform class object from palette for specified column and row. Return NULL for empty tile ( with negative index to palette ).

Bool Init (  const Char *  name,
const Char *  palette_name,
Short  x_,
Short  y_,
Short  x_size_,
Short  y_size_,
Int  x_div_,
Int  y_div_
) 
 

Performs the complete initialization of tile map class object.

This function must be called before any operations on TileMap class object.

Parameters:
name pointer to ASCII tile map name.
palette_name pointer to ASCII tile map palette name.
x_ define x value for upper-left corner coordinate of tile map on global screen map.
y_ define y value for upper-left corner coordinate of tile map on global screen map.
x_size_ define tile width.
y_size_ define tile height.
x_div_ define tile map columns count.
y_div_ define tile map rows count.
Returns:
Return True if tile map init complete successfully else False.

void SetCellSize (  Short  x_size_,
Short  y_size_
) 
 

Set new tile size.

Parameters:
x_size_ define tile width.
y_size_ define tile height.

void SetPalette (  vector< SpriteTransform * > *  palette_  ) 
 

Set pointer to tile map palette.

Parameters:
palette_ pointer to tile map palette as a vector class object that store pointers to SpriteTransform class objects. Tile map index 0 point to first element of this vector, index 1 point to the next element and and so on.

void SetZOrder (  Int  z_order_  ) 
 

Set new base z order for tile map.

Parameters:
z_order_ define new base z order for sprite.
